text:
(1) Amboy Road, west of the N.W. corner of Huguenot Ave., showing the Huguenot Park Reformed Church. It was dedicated on May 18, 1924, as a National monument to the Huguenot settlers of America. For additional information see Staten Island and its People by Leng and Davis, vol. 1, p 442.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) Another view of the church, looking eastward.

September 24, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) An additional view.

September 24, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.
